org.xchain.framework.lifecycle

Class Lifecycle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.lifecycle.Lifecycle

  • @LifecycleClass(uri="http://www.xchain.org/framework/lifecycle")
public final class Lifecycle
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class of the xchain framework. When the lifecycle is started the LifecycleStepScanner will scan for LifecycleSteps in the current context class loader. All LifecycleSteps will then be started with the Lifecycle. When the Lifecycle stops all the LifecycleSteps started when the Lifecycle started will be stopped in a LIFO manner.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Devon Tackett, John Trimble, Josh Kennedy
    See Also:
    LifecycleStep, LifecycleStepScanner

        public static void startLifecycle()
                           throws LifecycleException

        See Also:
        LifecycleStepScanner

        Throws:

      • restartLifecycle

        public static void restartLifecycle()
                             throws LifecycleException
        Restart the lifecycle. This effectively shuts down all current lifecycle steps and restarts the lifecycle.
        Throws:
        LifecycleException

        public static boolean isRunning()

      • getLifecycleContext

        public static LifecycleContext getLifecycleContext()
        Returns the current LifecycleContext. Null if the Lifecycle is not running.

      • startCreateConfigDocumentContext

        @StartStep(localName="create-config-document-context",
           after="xml-factory-lifecycle")
public static void startCreateConfigDocumentContext()
                                             throws LifecycleException
        This step creates a ConfigDocumentContext instance which will be passed to all lifecycle start steps, which take a ConfigDocumentContext, when Lifecycle.startLifecycle() is called. Consequently, all lifecycle steps that take a ConfigDocumentContext have an implicit dependency upon this step such that they always run after it.
        Throws:
        LifecycleException

      • startConfiguration

        @StartStep(localName="config",
           xmlns="xmlns:config=\'http://xchain.org/config/1.0\'")
public static void startConfiguration(LifecycleContext context,
                                              ConfigDocumentContext configDocContext)
                               throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Lifecycle Step to load the xchain configuration.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException

      • startCommandEngineering

        @StartStep(localName="command-engineering",
           after="config")
public static void startCommandEngineering(LifecycleContext context)
        The lifecycle step that engineers command classes. This step creates a ClassScanner for the context's class loader and calls its scan method.
        See Also:
        ClassScanner

      • startXmlFactory

        @StartStep(localName="xml-factory-lifecycle",
           before="config")
public static void startXmlFactory(LifecycleContext context)
                            throws LifecycleException
        Calls XmlFactoryLifecycle.startLifecycle( ... ).
        Parameters:
        context -
        Throws:
        LifecycleException

      • stopXmlFactory

        @StopStep(localName="xml-factory-lifecycle")
public static void stopXmlFactory(LifecycleContext context)
        Calls XmlFactoryLifecycle.stopLifecycle( ... ).
        Parameters:
        context -

      • startDefaultXmlFactory

        @StartStep(localName="default-xml-factory",
           before="xml-factory-lifecycle")
public static void startDefaultXmlFactory(LifecycleContext context)
        Sets the default SAX, XSLT, and DOM implementations to use on the XmlFactoryLifecycle for those that are not already set. To override any of these defaults, create a chain that runs before this one and sets the factories as desired on the XmlFactoryLifecycle.
        Parameters:
        context -

      • stopDefaultXmlFactory

        @StopStep(localName="default-xml-factory")
public static void stopDefaultXmlFactory(LifecycleContext context)
        Unsets any defaults set by the default-xml-factory start step.
        Parameters:
        context -

      • startDefaultConversions

        @StartStep(localName="default-conversions")
public static void startDefaultConversions(LifecycleContext lifecycleContext)
        Sets up the default conversion objects in the bean utils.

      • stopDefaultConversions

        @StopStep(localName="default-conversions")
public static void stopDefaultConversions(LifecycleContext lifecycleContext)
        Removes the standard conversion objects in the bean utils.
